00025 int BaseModule::ProcessGenericEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup){
00026   // This is called by our main routine and would allow later to split into different 
00027   // process routines if we have more than one Tree and hence different tpyes of data input.
00028 
00029   if(dir) dir->cd();

00031   gDirectory->cd("/");
00032 
00033   return ret;
